name: Fluid Titanium
description: The bridge connecting life and machinery, the core of synthetic blood systems

content.content: Fluid Titanium, also known as "Fluid Body", is a class of metallic titanium organic compounds that appears as a blue liquid.

items: Appearance: Blue liquid
Molecular Structure: Chain structure with gaps between molecular chains
Special Properties: Composition partially unknown
Color Change: Appears pale purple when mixed with human blood
Gaps between molecular chains support simultaneous passage of electrons and data
Can serve as a dual-channel medium for information transmission
Possesses high biocompatibility
Supports perfect integration of Fluid Titanium and Feedscatteron

content.content: The most important property of Fluid Titanium is its ability to stably preserve Feedscatteron:

items: Extends Feedscatteron decay cycle from 34.28 seconds to 341,879 years
Particles remain active during preservation
Supports high-speed data transmission
Exact preservation mechanism not yet fully understood

content.content: This preservation capability may be related to the special gaps in the molecular structure, which can stabilize the quantum states of Feedscatteron.

items: Pure State: Blue
Mixed with Human Blood: Pale, muted purple
Displays different shades at different concentrations
Serves as the primary medium for the circulatory system
Transports nutrients and signals
Supports Feedscatteron flow
Concentration Control: 1.2 mmol/L⁻¹ (circular motion region)
Flow Characteristics: Perfect arc turns with zero kinetic energy loss
CPU/GPU computational medium
Data transmission channel
Heat management system
Computation cycle in specialized silicon chips: 3,417 months

content.title: Extreme Toxicity Warning
content: Fluid Titanium is extremely toxic to humans
Small amounts can cause human death

content.content: On October 25, 2021, during a suburban factory explosion accident, blue Fluid Titanium was discovered at the scene. The accident caused the factory to collapse, and 1547 was injured in the incident but obtained crucial materials.

On May 7, 2022, during the Fluid Titanium mine incident, the blue Fluid Titanium mixed with red blood, revealing a pale, muted purple color. This incident provided the necessary materials for the birth of 1548.

rows: Perfect arc turns, zero kinetic energy loss
